Html:
when we remove items from cart,there is a  javascript function handleUpdate()

i do not understand what is the use of this funtion.
It's no longer needed - it was there from the MVC 2 version of the tutorial which used Microsoft Ajax; when converting to jQuery I moved the update into the jQuery code. I'll it in the next release.
I would seriously consider using the Ajax helpers for this. Would decrease the complexity of the code a little bit, plus it's be be a good demo.
